desc: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, attacks deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> of Arts damage as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>; if target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@extra_ep_damage_scale:0%}</> ATK as Elemental damage

Deals <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage and inflict <$ba.dt.fear>fear</> for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds to target to nearby enemies then dealing same amount Arts damage to nearby enemies. Both attack deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> of Arts damage as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>; if target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, increase effect of the First/Second talent to <@ba.vup>{scale_delta_to_one}</>x
<@ba.rem>Can hold {2} charge</>

Attack Range <@ba.vup>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, attack <@ba.vup>1</> additional target; if target is under the burst effect of <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>, deal an additional <@ba.vup>{attack@extra_ep_damage_scale:0%}</> ATK as Elemental damage
Immediately gains <@ba.vup>{ABCDEF_s_1[once].cost}</> Deployment Points. Detonates Cherry-3 and dealing <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</> as Physical damage to enemies within the four surrounding tiles.

Gradually gains <@ba.vup>{value}</> DP over the skill duration. ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>. Cherry-3 stops attacking; Block <@ba.vup>+{block_cnt}</>, DEF <@ba.vup>+{def:0%}</>
<@ba.rem>Detonates Cherry-3 when skill ends</>
